content.p: The School of Geography offers a wide range of module choice to our undergraduates, catering for most interests within geography. We offer a number of undergraduate degrees with opportunities for field trips in the UK and overseas to develop your field skills, as well as opportunities to study abroad. Helpful information for undergraduate applicants The BA and BSc degrees in Geography are two routes into a common degree programme designed for students with a wide variety of pre-existing qualifications from across the sciences, social sciences and humanities. Both BA and BSc students are free develop their interests and enthusiasms in human and/or physical geography. Explore our campuses, accommodation and student life online. You can also discover campus life with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Visit our open days hub Megan talks about her geography degree. Sir Clive Granger Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
